statements: DELETE FROM PoliticianSentimentAnalysis WHERE politician_id = 100 AND social_media_platform = 'Twitter';
DELETE FROM PoliticianSentimentAnalysis WHERE sentiment_score < -0.5 AND politician_name LIKE '%Trump%';
DELETE FROM SocialMediaSentiments WHERE politician_id = 5 AND sentiment = 'positive';
DELETE FROM SocialMediaSentiments WHERE sentiment = 'positive' AND politician_id = 1;
DELETE FROM SocialMediaSentiment WHERE sentiment = 'Negative' AND timestamp < '2021-01-01';
